mapper.select: select * from post where 1 = 1 and post.content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') and post.user_idx in (select user.idx from user where public_type = 'Y') order by (select count(*) from `like` where post_idx = post.idx) desc

select t.idx, t.content, count(pt.post_idx) as post_cnt from tag t left outer join post_tag pt on t.idx = pt.tag_idx where 1 = 1 and t.content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') group by t.idx order by case when t.content = #{keyword} then 0 when t.content = #{keyword} +'%' then 1 when t.content = '%'+ #{keyword} +'%' then 2 when t.content = '%'+ #{keyword} then 3 else 4 end

select u.idx, u.user_name, u.profile_msg, u.profile_image_url, u.full_name, count(fl.idx) as followers_cnt /* 프로필 사진 join 필요 */ from user u left outer join follow fl on u.idx = fl.to_user_idx where 1 = 1 and u.user_name like concat('%', #{originKeyword}, '%') or u.profile_msg like concat('%', #{originKeyword}, '%') or u.full_name like concat('%', #{originKeyword}, '%')
or u.user_name like concat('%', #{newKeyword}, '%') or u.profile_msg like concat('%', #{newKeyword}, '%') or u.full_name like concat('%', #{newKeyword}, '%')
group by u.idx order by case when u.user_name = #{originKeyword} then 0
when u.user_name = #{newKeyword} then 1
when u.profile_msg = #{originKeyword} then 2
when u.profile_msg = #{newKeyword} then 3
when u.full_name = #{originKeyword} then 4
when u.full_name = #{newKeyword} then 5
else 6 end
